timeline.message: Handle NaN when extracting VALUES predicate
Fix dynamic filter failure in presence of NaN

timeline.author: sopel39

replies.bodyText: i do not have a strong opinion. There are exactly 3 non-test call sites for multipleValues, so updating it in a follow up would not be a problem.
replies.author: findepi

timeline.bodyText: Consider adding comment. It might not be obvious for reader why NaN makes TupleDomain accept all non-null values.
timeline.author: sopel39

replies.bodyText:
This knowledge is sprinkled in multiple places in the code base already.
There seems to be no good place to place such a comment though.
replies.author: findepi
